= TMUX =
Terminal Multiplexer

File with personal configuration settings: [[local:~/.tmux.conf]]

== BASIC KEYBINDS ==
=== LEADER ===
`CTRL-B`


== CUSTOM SETUP ==
=== 256 color support ===
one possibility:
{{{class="brush: bash"
# set 256 color support for tmux
set -g default-terminal "screen-256color"
}}}

or (this one works - tested);
{{{class="brush: bash"
# set 256 color support for tmux
set -g default-terminal "tmux-256color"
}}}

=== default command language ===
{{{class="brush: bash"
set-option -g default-command bash
}}}


=== status bar colors ===
{{{class="brush: bash"
set -g status-bg blue
}}}

or:
{{{class="brush: bash"
set -g status-fg black
}}}

=== highight and display ===
{{{class="brush: bash"
setw -g monitor-activity on
setw -g visual-activity on
}}}

=== start window numbering at 1 instead of 0 ===
{{{class="brush: bash"
set -g base-index 1
}}}

=== start pane numbering at 1 instead if 0 ===
{{{class="brush: bash"
set -g pane-base-index 1
}}}

=== bind h to hortizontal split panes ===
{{{class="brush: bash"
unbind '"'
bind h split-window -v
}}}

=== bind v to vertical split panes ===
{{{class="brush: bash"
unbind %
bind v split-window -h
}}}
